name: part_012
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Watame gives her closing remarks with the "Watame Night Fever!!" logo on screen.
Title card for "Amazing Swing" featuring a 3D new outfit reveal and a major announcement.

subtitles.original: この後の新曲MVや、全編ライブも楽しんでいきましょう！
subtitles.english:
Let's enjoy the upcoming new song MV
and the full live concert!

subtitles.original: みんなね、バタバタすると思いますが、
subtitles.english: I'm sure you'll all be busy getting ready,

subtitles.original: わためは全編ライブの準備をしてきますので、またそこで会いましょう！
subtitles.english:
...but I'll be preparing for the full concert,
so I'll see you there!

subtitles.original: これからもよろしくね！
subtitles.english: I look forward to your continued support!
